languages.text: "Данный мир объявлен закрытым для мирян ввиду заповедных таинств Адептус Механикус, свершаемых на нем. Боюсь, что запрет касается даже Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "Данный мир объявлен закрытым для мирян ввиду заповедных таинств Адептус Механикус, свершаемых на нем. Боюсь, что запрет касается даже Вашей Светлости".

languages.text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Данный мир объявлен закрытым для мирян ввиду заповедных таинств Адептус Механикус, свершаемых на нем. Боюсь, что запрет касается даже Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed at its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed at its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: « Ce monde est formellement interdit aux laïcs en raison des rites sacrés que l'Adeptus Mechanicus y pratique. Je crains que cette interdiction ne s'étende également à vous, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Ce monde est formellement interdit aux laïcs en raison des rites sacrés que l'Adeptus Mechanicus y pratique. Je crains que cette interdiction ne s'étende également à vous, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: “这个世界禁止普通人进入，因为行星表面正在举行机械修会的神圣仪式。恐怕即便是大人您，也要受到同样的限制。”
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界禁止普通人进入，因为行星表面正在举行机械修会的神圣仪式。恐怕即便是大人您，也要受到同样的限制。”

languages.text: "Dieses Welt ist für Laien tabu, weil auf ihrer Oberfläche die heiligen Riten des Adeptus Mechanicus abgehalten werden. Ich fürchte, dieses Gebot gilt selbst für Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Welt ist für Laien tabu, weil auf ihrer Oberfläche die heiligen Riten des Adeptus Mechanicus abgehalten werden. Ich fürchte, dieses Gebot gilt selbst für Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: «Debido a los ritos sagrados del Adeptus Mechanicus que se están realizando en su superficie, los laicos tienen prohibida la entrada a este mundo. Me temo que dicha restricción también se aplica a usted, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Debido a los ritos sagrados del Adeptus Mechanicus que se están realizando en su superficie, los laicos tienen prohibida la entrada a este mundo. Me temo que dicha restricción también se aplica a usted, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: 「この惑星は、帝国技術局の神聖な儀式を地上で行なっているので、信者達は立ち入り禁止だと言い渡されています。残念ながら、こちらの件は陛下にも当てはまります」
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星は、帝国技術局の神聖な儀式を地上で行なっているので、信者達は立ち入り禁止だと言い渡されています。残念ながら、こちらの件は陛下にも当てはまります」

languages.text: "Bu dünyanın, Adeptus Mechanicus'un yüzeyinde gerçekleştirdiği kutsal ayinler sebebiyle ruhban dışı sınıfa kapalı olduğu ilan edilmiştir. Korkarım bu sınırlama sizin için bile geçerli {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "This world is declared off-limits to the laity due to the sacred rites of the Adeptus Mechanicus being performed on its surface. I am afraid the restriction applies even to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
